key_risks: Industry cyclicality and susceptibility to economic downturns
Supply chain vulnerabilities and global disruptions
Geopolitical risks, especially in the Asia-Pacific market
High competitive pressure in the semiconductor equipment industry
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities and recent data breach
controversies: Data breach in May 2023 claimed by the LockBit ransomware group
environmental_issues: Focus on sustainability and reducing environmental impact of products
governance_issues: Cybersecurity concerns and potential reputational damage from data breach
